about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in this top down diverse microscopic adventure gameplay as a sentient A.I nanobot. In the year 2066, mankind has finally achieved the pinnacle in medical advancement with the massive deployment of nanotechnologies in our daily life. Humans were given a chance with living almost immortally without worrying of any diseases with lifespan possibly exceeding 300 years old and beyond.

As these nanomachines begun massively deployed, some of these nanobots in medical development has shown traits of being sentient while others slowly adopting the similar sentient behaviours overtime in the human body. These life extending nanomachines was subsequently superceded due to its defects. Scientist scrambled to terminate these nanomachines as it invades the human bodies causing harm and irratic behaviours.

Dr.Hsu, the forerunner and pioneer of these nanomachines began to explore new type of nanobot specially designed to eradicate all defective AI or sentient nanomachines. The first prototype AI nanobot was called VENTURE and it will seek out all defective nanomachines to find clues of why the earlier version of the naomachines failed.

This is a story how VENTURE embark on its journey into a corrupted human body and find its way to communicate with MOTHER, the sole sentient A.I corruptor in the microscopic world!

FEATURES:

  • Single player story driven top down adventure game
  • Explore the microscopic alien world and encounter viruses, bacterias and nanobot probes
  • Experience the atmospheric and diverse environments never before seen on a game!
  • Hand drawn animated organism and alien lifeforms
  • Evade, shrink and protect yourself from any hostile encounters along the way
  • Specially composed atmospheric soundtrack and ambient sounds
  • Solve maeningful puzzles and interact with Dr.Hsu and other NPC

  • Graphics: GTX850M
